Sobble.Dialogue.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: There's a monster in the house! Don't worry, I'll just use water pulse!~
Sobble.Dialogue.SpouseStardrop: I found this on the beach... Please take it!~
Sobble.Dialogue.MovieInvitation: Of course I'll go to the movies with you!~
Sobble.Dialogue.AcceptBirthdayGift: A gift for my birthday?! Yayyyyy!~
Sobble.Dialogue.RejectBouquet: I-I don't want that kind of commitment...
Sobble.Dialogue.RejectMermaidPendant: N-no... I don't want to be married...
Sobble.Dialogue.AcceptGift_Loved: You're giving me this? Thank you!~
Sobble.Dialogue.RejectMovieTicket_Alread: I-I already watched a movie this w-week...
Sobble.Dialogue.Mon: Ummm.... Hi... I-I hope you're having a good day...
Sobble.Dialogue.Wed: What is your favorite pokemon move..? #$b# I-I hope it's one I can learn...
Sobble.Dialogue.Fri: The arcana is the means in which all is revealed #$b# Developers note: Remove placeholder Persona 3 quote #$e# How'd you like my impression? I wanted to prank you!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Sat: It's the start of the weekend. My friends should be gathering in the valley soon.
Sobble.Dialogue.Mon2: In case you haven't noticed... I'm not 100% human... #$b# I-I'm actually part Sobble, hence my name... #$e# Yes, that does mean I can use pokemon moves...
Sobble.Dialogue.Tue2: Since I'm part human, I can't evolve into a Drizzile or Inteleon... #$b# However I can still use some of their moves.
Sobble.Dialogue.Wed2: If I touch water, I can turn invisible... #$b# If I don't wanna be invisible, then I don't have to... #$b# The water just gives me the ability to do so...
Sobble.Dialogue.Thu2: If I cry then everyone nearby will also cry... #$b# It's caused a lot of problems for me before...
Sobble.Dialogue.Fri2: I'm glad Sophia lets me live with her. #$b# I don't know what I would do without her...
Sobble.Dialogue.Sat2: Sophia's not my only friend, I also have a friend in Spruceview named Sumi!~ #$b# She introduced me to my favorite anime, The Ocean's Lament!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Sun2: It's a really nice day out today!~ #$b# I hope it stays like this for a while!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Mon4: You should watch The Ocean's Lament with me and Sumi sometime!~ #$b# It's a really good anime!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Tue4: What moves do I know..? #$b# Well, theres Water Pulse, Icy Wind, U-turn, and Shadow Ball so far!~ #$b# I-I hope I can learn more moves soon!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Wed4: As a result of being a pokemon-human hybrid, my hair is really smooth, and I can also breathe underwater!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Thu4: Since I'm part Sobble, I have to be careful around electricity... #$b# Electronics are fine but any sort of open electricity is dangerous for me...
Sobble.Dialogue.Fri4: Sophia is a really good friend of mine, and so are you!~ #$b# But you aren't my only friend, I have many pokemon friends as well!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Sat4: C-could I use you as a venting tool of sorts..? #$b# I-I need to get something off my chest... #$b# !!! #$b# N-nevermind!!!
Sobble.Dialogue.Sun4: Because of my water type moves, I can swim really well!~ #$b# I can also grow plants pretty well.
Sobble.Dialogue.Mon6: I-I-I can't keep going on like this... #$b# I-I really need someone to talk to... #$b# !!! #$b# I-It's n-nothing... #$b# I-I'll tell you on s-sunday...
Sobble.Dialogue.Tue6: Sophia is a really great friend of mine. #$b# She really helps me with my anxiety!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Wed6: Hai!~ How are you doing today?~ #$b# I hope you're doing well!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Thu6: You are one of my best friends!~ #$b# I-I hope you know that!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Fri6: You should watch The Ocean's Lament with me!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Sat6: Have you watched any anime before? If so, what are your recommendations?
Sobble.Dialogue.Sun6: ..? #$b# !!! #$b# I-I completely forgot... I was gonna tell you... #$b# Ummm... #$b# I-I like Sophia... #$b# N-no, m-more than a friend... #$b# I-I... I like like her... #$b# ... #$b# D-don't tell anyone... Please...
Sobble.Dialogue.Mon8: Y-y-you think I-I should tell Sophia..? #$b# I-I don't know... #$b# I-I don't have the courage...
Sobble.Dialogue.Tue8: Good morning!~ #$b# I hope you slept well!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Wed8: I should visit Sumi sometime... #$b# I-I hope she's doing well...
Sobble.Dialogue.Thu8: I -I-I don't know how to tell Sophia... #$b# I-I don't want to ruin our friendship...
Sobble.Dialogue.Fri8: I love the weather today, it reminds me of Deerling and Sawsbuck! #$b# They change form depending on the season.
Sobble.Dialogue.Sat8: When did you last see a movie? #$b# I hope it was a good one!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Sun8: I'm currently in the process of learning Snipe Shot! #$b# It's a really cool move!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Mon10: I-I asked Sophia... #$b# I-I told her how I felt but she said she didn't feel the same... #$b# But that doesn't matter, cause I've got you!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Wed10: I finally learned Snipe Shot! #$b# I wonder if I can gigantimax... #$b# If I can, does that mean I can use G-max Hydro Snipe?
Sobble.Dialogue.Thu10: I love you so so much!~ #$b# I-I don't know what I would do without you...
Sobble.Dialogue.Sat10: You are my bestest friend!~ #$b# I-I love you so much!~
Sobble.Dialogue.Sun10: I'm gonna watch The Ocean's Lament later, wanna join?
Sobble.Dialogue.Introduction: Sawb..? Oh! Umm, Welcome to the valley!~
Sobble.Dialogue.cc_Begin: It's so cool that you're repairing the Community Center!~
Sobble.Dialogue.joja_Begin: Y-y-you teamed up w-with Joja..? J-Joja is gonna scare away all my f-friends...
Sobble.Dialogue.cc_Minecart: The minecarts are repaired? That's great!~
Sobble.Dialogue.cc_Greenhouse: You're greenhouse is fixed? My friends now have a place to stay when they visit!~
Sobble.Dialogue.cc_Bridge: You fixed the bridge to the quarry? That should help the valley a lot!~
Sobble.Dialogue.cc_Boulder: You removed the boulder in the mountains? The water my friends live in is now safe!~
Sobble.Dialogue.cc_Complete: You repaired the community center? Take that Joja!~
Sobble.Dialogue.movieTheater: A movie theatre has been built? I can't wait to see a movie!~
Sobble.Dialogue.gotPet: You got a pet? You better not forget about me!~
Sobble.Dialogue.GreenRainFinished: Awww, the refreshing rain is gone. I hope it comes back soon!~
Sobble.Dialogue.pamHouseUpgrade: You built Pam a house? That's so nice of you!~
Sobble.Dialogue.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Pam got a house? I-I hope she likes it...
Sobble.Dialogue.wonGrange: You won the Grange Display competition? That's amazing!~
Sobble.Dialogue.wonEggHunt: You won the egg hunt? That's awesome!~
Sobble.Dialogue.wonIceFishing: You won the ice fishing competition? That's so cool!~
Sobble.Dialogue.willyCrabs: Do you know if Willy likes Krabby... I wanna introduce one of my friends to him...
Sobble.Dialogue.FullCrabPond: You have a pond full of Kingler? I'm sure they like it there!~
Sobble.Dialogue.dating_Sobble: I'm so happy to be dating you!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Day_Sobble: The rain is so beautiful... #$b# I love you!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Day_1: The rain is so beautiful... #$b# I love you!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Day_3: The rain is so beautiful... #$b# I love you!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Night_Sobble: The rain is so beautiful at night... #$b# I love you so so so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Night_0: The rain at night is so refreshing... I love it!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Night_1: The rain is so beautiful at night... #$b# I love you so so so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Night_2: The rain at night is so refreshing... I love it!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Night_3: The rain is so beautiful at night... #$b# I love you so so so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Rainy_Night_4: The rain at night is so refreshing... I love it!~
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Day_Sobble: I'm thinking of learning a new water type move... #$b# But what move should I learn..?
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Day_0: I should go visit my friends sometime... #$b# I hope they are doing well...
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Day_1: I'm thinking of learning a new water type move... #$b# But what move should I learn..?
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Day_2: I should go visit my friends sometime... #$b# I hope they are doing well...
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Day_3: I'm thinking of learning a new water type move... #$b# But what move should I learn..?
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Day_4: I should go visit my friends sometime... #$b# I hope they are doing well...
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Night_Sobble: I love you so so so much!~ #$b# Mwah!~
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Night_0: The night sky is so beautiful...
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Night_1: I love you so so so much!~ #$b# Mwah!~
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Night_2: The night sky is so beautiful...
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Night_3: I love you so so so much!~ #$b# Mwah!~
Sobble.Marriage.Indoor_Night_4: The night sky is so beautiful...
Sobble.Marriage.Outdoor_Sobble: That cave on the farm is such a nice place to relax!~
Sobble.Marriage.Outdoor_0: It's such a nice day outside!~
Sobble.Marriage.Outdoor_1: That cave on the farm is such a nice place to relax!~
Sobble.Marriage.Outdoor_2: It's such a nice day outside!~
Sobble.Marriage.Outdoor_3: That cave on the farm is such a nice place to relax!~
Sobble.Marriage.Outdoor_4: It's such a nice day outside!~
Sobble.Marriage.jobReturn_Sobble: That was a long day at work...
Sobble.Marriage.OneKid_0: %kid1 is so cute!~ #$b# Just like you!~
Sobble.Marriage.OneKid_1: I hope %kid1 gets along with Jas and Vincent...
Sobble.Marriage.OneKid_2: I love %kid1 just as much as I love you!~
Sobble.Marriage.OneKid_3: I wonder what %kid1 will be when they grow up...
Sobble.Marriage.OneKid_4: %kid1 is such a blessing for us!~
Sobble.Marriage.TwoKids_1: %kid1 and %kid2 are so cute together!~ #$b# I hope they keep their siblingly bond as they grow up!~
Sobble.Marriage.TwoKids_2: I wonder if our kids will be able to use moves like me... #$b# Wouldn't it be so cool if I could teach them how to use moves?
Sobble.Marriage.TwoKids_3: %kid2 really looks up to %kid1 #$b# Just like I look up to you!~
Sobble.Marriage.TwoKids_4: %kid1 and %kid2 are such a blessing for us!~
Sobble.Marriage.Good_1: Thank you for never giving up on me, even when I was sad...
Sobble.Marriage.Good_2: I'm surprised you've learnt to deal with my anxiety... #$b# That's why I love you so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Good_3: You are my favorite person in the whole world!~ #$b# I love you so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Good_4: It's been so long since I last went invisible! #$b# That's proof that you have helped me so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Good_6: Thank you for never giving up on me, even when I was sad...
Sobble.Marriage.Good_7: I'm surprised you've learnt to deal with my anxiety... #$b# That's why I love you so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Good_8: You are my favorite person in the whole world!~ #$b# I love you so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Good_9: It's been so long since I last went invisible! #$b# That's proof that you have helped me so much!~
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_0: I've been thinking about taking up a new hobby... #$b# Maybe I could try modeling?
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_1: It's been a nice few days in terms of weather...
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_2: I'm going to watch The Ocean's Lament later, care to join?
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_3: Your hair is so silky today...
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_5: I've been thinking about taking up a new hobby... #$b# Maybe I could try modeling?
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_6: It's been a nice few days in terms of weather...
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_7: I'm going to watch The Ocean's Lament later, care to join?
Sobble.Marriage.Neutral_8: Your hair is so silky today...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_0: I-I feel like we don't talk as much as we used too...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_1: I hope you're not hiding anything from me...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_2: I-I feel like we don't talk as much as we used too...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_3: I hope you're not hiding anything from me...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_4: I-I feel like we don't talk as much as we used too...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_5: I hope you're not hiding anything from me...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_6: I-I feel like we don't talk as much as we used too...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_7: I hope you're not hiding anything from me...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_8: I-I feel like we don't talk as much as we used too...
Sobble.Marriage.Bad_9: I hope you're not hiding anything from me...
Sobble.Event.SobbleSecret1: H-hey Sophia... Thanks for meeting me out here...
Sobble.Event.SobbleSecret2: No problem. What is it you wanted to talk about?
Sobble.Event.SobbleSecret4: Well of course, I like you too. #$b# We're friends after all!
Sobble.Event.SobbleSecret5: N-n-no... N-not like that... #$b# I-I mean... #$b# I-I... #$b# I l-like like you... #$b# As in... I-I love you... #$b# !!! #$b# I-I-I'm s-sorry... I-I know this is a lot and I-
Sobble.Event.SobbleSecret6: ...Sobble... Stop... #$b# I don't know how to tell you... #$b# But I don't feel the same. #$b# I'm sorry... #$b# You're still a great friend friend either way...
Sobble.Event.SobbleDate: Hai @! #$b# You're probably wondering why I called you out here... #$b# I wanted to talk about something... #$b# When I asked Sophia out... I only got the courage to do so because of you... #$b# A-and she ended up rejecting me... #$b# Whatever your reason was for asking me to date you, whether it was out of pity or kindness... #$b# It made me realize something... #$b# Whilst I may of had a crush on Sophia... #$b# It was you that stuck by me the whole time... #$b# And now I know... #$b# I love you... #$b# I-I love you so much!~ #$b# I-I don't care if you don't feel the same... #$b# I-I just wanted to let you know... #$b# I-I love you...
